ARABIC: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰلِقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or were they created out of nothing, or are they the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or were they created of themselves? Or are they the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did they come into being without any creator? Or were they their own creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have they been created from nothing or are they themselves their own creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Have they not been created from some source, or are they themselves the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or were they created by nothing Or were they themselves the creators
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or were they created without there being anything, or are they the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or were they created out of naught? Or are they the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Were they created out of nothing, or are they their own creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have they not been created by aught, or are they the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Were they created from nothing? Or are they [their own] creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Were they created of nothing, or were they themselves the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Were they created by nothing, or were they themselves the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, were they created out of nothing? Or, were they their own creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:35] Or were they created out of nothing?, [that is] without a Creator. Or are they the creators?, of themselves. It makes no sense for a created thing to have no creator, nor can a thing that will cease to existent [have the power to] create. There must be a Creator of them, and that is God, the One, so why do they not affirm His Oneness and believe in His Messenger and His Book?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or were they created out of naught) without a father; and it is also said: without a Lord? (Or are they the creators) rather than being the created?
